1106260.name: Green Dragon - Original Soundtrack
1106260.description:
This music DLC contains 3 UNIQUE soundtracks from the Green Dragon -game.
Soundtrack DLC will be updated when we add more levels to the game.



After purchasing this DLC, you can access these files directly from Steam soundtrack player or from your files root (Green Dragon - Original Soundtrack -folder).

After purchasing you will get access to these tracks (October Update):

1,1: Game Over, Duration 3,26, mp3
1,2: Thomas Asymmetrical, Duration 3,45, mp3
1,3: Thomas Dunck, Duration 3:29, mp3

License Permissions:


You can do:
+ You can use this asset for personal and commercial purpose. Credit is not required but would be appreciated
+ Modify to suit your needs

You cannot do:
- Resell/redistribute this asset
1106260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
